DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate whether exercise improves cognitive and motor functions in Parkinson's disease. To test this hypothesis, the researchers study general brain functions in subjects with PD during a 6-months exercise program.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Physical Activity on the Brain in Parkinson's Disease (PD)
DOC.criteria: UPDRS <15 LDOPA responsive <5 yrs since diagnosis severe other diseases MMSE < 26 treatment with psychiatric medication
